currentTokenId(address).notice: Returns current position tokenId (0 if none).

exitPositionToVault(address).notice: Exit position to vault: remove all liquidity and keep tokens in vault.

openInitialPosition(address,int24,int24).notice: Open initial range (mint position). Returns tokenId and liquidity.

pool().notice: Immutable addresses needed by the adapter (pool, nfpm, gauge...).

rebalanceWithCaps(address,int24,int24,ui.notice: Rebalance width/caps. Implementations can burn & mint or adjust as needed.
